BodyName: Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the 311 customer service center to conduct customer satisfaction surveys after each 311 request for service or complaint is closed and to publish 311 request and survey data each month
Items.MatterName: Requiring the 311 customer service center to conduct customer satisfaction surveys after each 311 request for service or complaint is closed and to publish 311 request and survey data each month.

Items.MatterName: Post-employment activities of certain former public servants.
